Description: Items related to meals, snacks, and drinks — including dining out, takeaway, and groceries.
Physical and digital books, including manga, light novels, and non-instructional reading materials.
Examples: Sword Art Online Progressive (Kindle), The Last Wish (Book), Animal Farm (Book)

Description: Video games (digital or physical), in-game purchases, and gaming-specific hardware (e.g., consoles, controllers, headsets for gaming). Includes both games and related equipment.
Examples: Destiny 2 - 3000 Silver, Xbox Series X, Borderlands 3 (Digital)

Description: Recurring or one-time payments for digital services, apps, or software platforms.
Examples: Netflix Subscription, Adobe Creative Cloud, Spotify Premium

Description: Purchases related to movies, TV shows, and visual media — including tickets, digital rentals, streaming films, and physical formats like DVDs or Blu-rays. Excludes music-related media, which belong in the Music & Audio category.
Examples: Avengers Tickets, Thor: Ragnarok DVD, Solo: A Star Wars Story Ticket

Description: Purchases of physical or digital audio content, including music, soundtracks, audio dramas, and voice packs. Excludes streaming subscriptions, which go under Digital Subscriptions.
Examples: Pokemon ORAS Soundtrack (Digital), Beyond the Boundary OST CD, Otonari no Tenshi-sama Audio Drama CD

Description: General-purpose electronic devices and accessories that do not belong in more specific categories (e.g., Gaming or Music & Audio). Includes items like cables, storage devices, and non-specialized tech accessories.
Examples: Seagate 1TB Hard drive, Laptop Charger Cable, iLuv Earpiece

Description: Wearable clothing items only — excludes bags, watches, or fashion accessories.
Products and services related to personal grooming, healthcare, fitness, and wellness.
Examples: Hair Cut, Doctor Consultation, Fitness Tracker

Description: Items intended for collection or fandom, including artbooks, commemorative items, pins, and other hobby goods.
Examples: Commemorative Coins, The Art of Halo 5: Guardians, Season of the Splicer Pin

Description: Items that don’t clearly fit the other categories — includes household supplies, transportation, or one-off fees.
Examples: EZ Link Add Money, Journal, Umbrella
